snippet: The Washington Post has joined The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal and Bloomberg as news organizations hacked after writing articles about China’s leaders.
abstract: Washington Post says its computers have been penetrated by Chinese hackers, following reports of attacks on The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal and Bloomberg News.
lead_paragraph: The Washington Post has joined The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal and Bloomberg as news organizations hacked after writing articles about China’s leaders.

headline.main: Washington Post Joins List of News Media Hacked by the Chinese
headline.print_headline: Washington Post Joins List of Media Hacked by the Chinese
